content: The Mad Tiger is waiting at the bottom of a well in Yellow Wind Ridge, but reaching it is quite the process. To begin the Mad Tiger quest, you must first defeat the Tiger's Acolyte and collect his Spirit along with an item called the Old Rattle Drum.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mad_Tiger_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Mad Tiger Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Mad Tiger Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Mad Tiger is waiting at the bottom of a well in Yellow Wind Ridge, but reaching it is quite the process. To begin the Mad Tiger quest, you must first defeat the Tiger's Acolyte and collect his Spirit along with an item called the Old Rattle Drum.
